Name: PigShip and the Giant Wolf
About the game: Put on your helmet and get ready to take action! In PigShip and the Giant Wolf you will help to a little piggy to save his brothers of the claws of the Wolf Army and defeat them. Are you ready for some classic Shootâ€™em Up action? With online ranking chart to compare your best times with friends and players from all over the world. Key Features Classic arcade with a beautiful pixel art. 6 Stages full of enemies and giant bosses. 3 shooting types. Ranking online on Bones Mode. Steam Achievements. Level up system on Normal Mode.
